Recommendations: To  prioritize  the  training  programs  to  be  undertaken  in  each  target clientele/barangay, Training Needs Assessment should be first conducted.
After the evaluation made during each extension activity conducted, this should be analyzed for possible replanning.
All extension activities should be properly documented.
Faculty members in the college conducting extension servicest should be deloaded or given equivalent teaching load to encourage them to do more extension services for the benefit of target clientele.
The extension office should be equipped with the needed equipment such ase set of computer with printer for the documentation and filing of need information.
A regular office clerk should be hired to help man the extension office to perform clerical job and assist in the implementation of extension activities.
